languages.text: "Вольный Торговец и ксенос-предательница. Чем она заслужила жизнь и место в ближайшем кругу? Я просто отказываюсь понимать происходящее. Упади на нас небо, я и то бы был меньше растерян".
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Yrliet started, after her betrayal and returning from Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец и ксенос-предательница. Чем она заслужила жизнь и место в ближайшем кругу? Я просто отказываюсь понимать происходящее. Упади на нас небо, я и то бы был меньше растерян".

languages.text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Yrliet started, after her betrayal and returning from Commorragh.
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец и ксенос-предательница. Чем она заслужила жизнь и место в ближайшем кругу? Я просто отказываюсь понимать происходящее. Упади на нас небо, я и то бы был меньше растерян".

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーと裏切り者の異種族だぞ。彼女はどうして生きることを許され、ローグトレーダーの執行会に加えられるなんてことがあるんだ？何がどうなってるのか、理解不能だ。たとえ空が頭上に落ちてきたとしても、今ほど困惑することはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーと裏切り者の異種族だぞ。彼女はどうして生きることを許され、ローグトレーダーの執行会に加えられるなんてことがあるんだ？何がどうなってるのか、理解不能だ。たとえ空が頭上に落ちてきたとしても、今ほど困惑することはないだろう」

languages.text: "{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} und eine heimtückische Xenos. Wie hat sie sich das Recht verdient, zu leben und in den innersten Kreis {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} aufgenommen zu werden? Ich verstehe einfach nicht, was vor sich geht. Selbst, wenn uns der Himmel auf den Kopf fallen würde, wäre ich weniger verwirrt."
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Ein Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} und eine heimtückische Xenos. Wie hat sie sich das Recht verdient, zu leben und in den innersten Kreis {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} aufgenommen zu werden? Ich verstehe einfach nicht, was vor sich geht. Selbst, wenn uns der Himmel auf den Kopf fallen würde, wäre ich weniger verwirrt."

languages.text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} et une traîtresse xénos. Comment a-t-elle gagné le droit de vivre et de faire partie de l'entourage proche {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Je refuse d'essayer de comprendre ce qui se passe ici. Même si le ciel nous tombait sur la tête, je ne serais pas aussi perplexe. »
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} et une traîtresse xénos. Comment a-t-elle gagné le droit de vivre et de faire partie de l'entourage proche {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Je refuse d'essayer de comprendre ce qui se passe ici. Même si le ciel nous tombait sur la tête, je ne serais pas aussi perplexe. »

languages.text: «{mf|Un|Una} Comerciante Independiente y una xenos traicionera. ¿Cómo se ha ganado el derecho a vivir y formar parte del círculo interior {mf|del ungido|de la ungida} del Emperador? Soy incapaz de asimilar lo que ocurre. Si el mismo cielo se me cayese encima, no me sentiría tan confuso como lo estoy ahora».
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Un|Una} Comerciante Independiente y una xenos traicionera. ¿Cómo se ha ganado el derecho a vivir y formar parte del círculo interior {mf|del ungido|de la ungida} del Emperador? Soy incapaz de asimilar lo que ocurre. Si el mismo cielo se me cayese encima, no me sentiría tan confuso como lo estoy ahora».

languages.text: “一边是行商浪人，一边是背后捅刀的异形，她究竟是凭什么活下来的？怎么还能成为行商浪人身边的核心成员？我真的无法理解到底发生了什么事情。就算现在天塌下来了，我也不会像这样不明所以。”
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."

traits.locale_text: “一边是行商浪人，一边是背后捅刀的异形，她究竟是凭什么活下来的？怎么还能成为行商浪人身边的核心成员？我真的无法理解到底发生了什么事情。就算现在天塌下来了，我也不会像这样不明所以。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir ile hain bir zeno... Hayatta kalıp bir de Hür Tacir'in gözdesi olma cüretini nereden buluyor? Anlamıyorum, anlamak da istemiyorum. Gök kubbe başımıza yıkılsa ancak bu kadar şaşırırdım."
languages.original_text: "A Rogue Trader and a backstabbing xenos. How did she earn the right to live and be included in the Rogue Trader's inner circle? I simply refuse to understand what is going on. Even if the sky were to fall on our heads, I would not be as confused as I am now."
